Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Maybe you should stay in today.#$b#I'm sure we could find something fun to do.$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Be careful working today. It's slippery.$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: You're sopping wet, dear.$s#$b#You'd best change into something dry.$0
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I hope you were careful today.$l#$e#You didn't slip or fall, did you?$s
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I'm in the mood to do cleaning today.$0#$b#It is looking a bit messy in here, don't you think?
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Be sure to wipe off your boots before you come back in, dear.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Good morning!$h#$b#I hope I didn't keep you up too late last night.$11
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Your backside is looking particularly lovely today.$h#$b#...$s#$b#Sorry, I wasn't sure how else to say it.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Wine and a book tonight, I think.#$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: How about we cozy up a bit earlier tonight?#$l#$b#If you're not too sleepy, I might have just the remedy...$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I hope you had a nice day!$l#$b# If not...$2#$b# I believe a massage is in order!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: There's my handsome groom.$l^There's my beautiful bride.$l
Entries.Outdoor_0: You've worked wonders on this farm.$l#$b#It looks incredible.$0
Entries.Outdoor_Harvey: I'd help out more on the farm if I had a clue what I was doing.$0#$b#I wouldn't want to get in your way!$h
Entries.funLeave_Harvey: I think I'll take a little walk today.$0#$b#Don't miss me too much.$l
Entries.funReturn_Harvey: I saw a mother duck and her babies on the walk back!.$h#$b#*sigh*$0#$b#Almost as cute as you.
Entries.OneKid_0: I'll feed little %kid1.$h#$b#You just do what you need to do, my love.$l
Entries.OneKid_1: I'll take care of %kid1 tonight.$0#$b# You get all the rest you need, alright?$h
Entries.OneKid_2: I wonder if %kid1 will follow in your footsteps and become a farmer.$0
Entries.OneKid_3: It's funny...$0#$b#I've always wanted to be a father, but now I'm afraid I'll leave an awful impression on little %kid1.$s#$b#But, I will always follow the principal that is;$0#$b# to give your children what you wish your parents gave you!$h
Entries.TwoKids_0: I hope the little ones still get along when they're in their adolescence.$s#$b#You know how teenagers are.$0#$b#Ridiculously hormonal.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I wonder what the kids will want to be when they grow up.
Entries.TwoKids_2: %kid1 and %kid2 fought over a spoon last night...$0#$b#Do you know how many spoons are in the cutlery drawer?$h
Entries.Good_1: I'm so happy you're in my life, @.$l
Entries.Good_2: Could we have...$0#$b#An especially close cuddle tonight?$l
Entries.Good_3: I wish I could tell you how much I miss you when you're out working the farm.$l
Entries.Good_4: I hope you miss me as much as I miss you when you're not right next to me.$l
Entries.Good_6: Your backside is looking particularly lovely today.$h#$b#...$s#$b#Sorry, I wasn't sure how else to say it.$l
Entries.fall_26_1: Will you hold my hand tomorrow?$0#$b#Spirit's Eve gives me intestinal pains...$s
Entries.winter_25_0: Have you found a gift for your secret friend yet?$0#$b#It took me forever to find a good one!$h#$e#Who is your secret friend, by the way...?$0#$b#Is it me?$h#$b#...$0#$b#I know, I know.$h#$b#You can't tell me.$0
